## Browser.close() method

Closes Chromium and all of its pages (if any were opened). The [Browser](./puppeteer.browser.md) object itself is considered to be disposed and cannot be used anymore.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
close(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
